DOC.brief_title: Study Pembrolizumab ( MK-3475 ) Participants With Advanced Non-small Cell Lung Cancer ( MK-3475-025/KEYNOTE-025 )
DOC.criteria: Histologically cytologically confirm diagnosis nonsmall cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) PDL1 positive per central laboratory review At least one measurable lesion .
